Please stop the ads!!!!!, It's very annoying. The app was very useful and easy to acses at the beginning,

ad while reading Quran, not good. since the last update, you are forced to see ads while reading, and it is really annoying as it moves shows persons talking and not good at all, will uninstall it. dont get why you need to make no sense ads...was there only when not reading.. please be respectful of Quran

title: Armada: Modern Tanks - Free Tank Shooting Games
description:
Join the best of new tank games and immerse yourself in a world of furious tank wars! 

Are you ready for tank wars in one of the best 3d games? Download right now this online multiplayer army tank games.
Try hill climb in mountains, fight in cities, survive in jungles.
Choose your tank, aim you tank guns, and hit your opponents and get all the tank stars 
Get into the heart of the battle created by the best multiplayer 3d games experience!


 DEFEND THE HONOR OF YOUR COUNTRY  
Fight for your country in our new tank shooter! Face opponents from the USA, China, Russia, Japan, Germany, and many other nations. The multiplayer tank wars begins now!

 EXCITING GAME MODES  
Choose your battle mode: multiplayer or solo war! 
Crazy mayhem in the free mode or coordinated attacks in group battles?
Communicate with players from many countries in the general and clan chats!

 HEAVY TANK, LIGHT TANK, KILLER TANK. CHOOSE YOU LIKE 
You will have various combat vehicles in your battle arsenal for multiplayer tank games. Tank shooting is a challenge you can win! 
Each tank represents a unique tactic, a unique warfare style. Different tanks shoot in different ways!
Use a light tank for recon missions on the enemy territory and hit-and-run tactics! Pick a heavy and powerful tank to get the blow on your powerful armor and strike back!
The upgrading starts from battle vehicles from the middle of the 20th century and at the last levels it will be newest tanks like the Leopard 2, Т-90, M1 Abrams, and Т-14 «Armata»
Try different guns.

 TANKS UPGRADES SYSTEM  
Unlock new tanks and upgrade them according to your strategic goals. Show your supremacy by using camouflages and decals.
Turn your tank into a death machine!

 VARIOUS COMBAT LOCATIONS  
Lots of battle arenas in all corners of the world await you!
Try hill climb in mountains, fight in cities, survive in jungles.
Get into the heart of the battle created by the best 3d games experience!
Armada is designed to be a real-time tank simulator customized for each player!

 BECOME THE BEST IN THE TANK WAR 
Join our fan communities for multiplayer tank games, we’ve built an exciting social tank force all over the world. Stay up today on the latest updates!
Compete in tournaments and take first place on the leaderboard! Hill climb in tournament rank. Your tank shot can change the whole deal! 
Choose your tanks, aim you tank guns, and hit your opponents to the stars in the eyes.
Earn all the rewards and share your achievements with your friends on Facebook

Armada is a real tank fight game we promise you will never forget. Fill your life with intense sensations. Start your own best multiplayer of all 3d games!

https://www.facebook.com/ArmadaModernTanks

Armada: tanks online available 24/7 right on your mobile or tablet.
REQUIRED CONNECTION TO THE INTERNET NETWORK.

Get into the heart of the battle created by the best 3d games experience!
Armada is designed to be a real-time tank simulator customized for each player!

BECOME THE BEST IN THE TANK WAR
Join our fan communities for multiplayer tank games, we’ve built an exciting social tank force all over the world. Stay up today on the latest updates!
Compete in tournaments and take first place on the leaderboard! Hill climb in tournament rank. Your tank shot can change the whole deal!
Choose your tanks, aim you tank guns, and hit your opponents to the stars in the eyes.
Earn all the rewards and share your achievements with your friends on Facebook

Armada is a real tank fight game we promise you will never forget. Fill your life with intense sensations. Start your own best multiplayer of all 3d games!

https://www.facebook.com/ArmadaModernTanks

Armada: tanks online available 24/7 right on your mobile or tablet.
REQUIRED CONNECTION TO THE INTERNET NETWORK.
summary: Get ready for the tank wars. Best of all modern army tank games absolutely free.
developerAddress: 41, Misiaouli & Kavazoglou Street, 2nd Floor, Office 203-B4, 3016 Limassol, Cyprus
recentChanges:
Performance improvements;
Minor bug fixes;
Increased gold earning in battles.
comments: This is the definition of a good tank game. I didn't put enough time into playing but decided to give it another shot. I am glad I did I'm having fun but can't figure out why the turret control overlaps the driving controls? Good job with this game and would like to see another soon. Thank you devs.

Honestly, I love this game! This is the best tanki online, i've ever play! Everything about this game is amazing The gameplay , graphics and controls. Played a few. Fuel always a problem but this one lets you play! I have had some bugs while in this game (like the game not bringing you back to lobby, just showing a loading screen), but they are not too bad! Good tanks game online🌏

Hi there it's a good idea of Modern Tank game but I have some suggestions for developers Number 1. improve graphics 2 HUD. 3 let MBTs in genrations like 1st gen MBT or 2nd gen ....4 clan or squad concept in witch player can play with other members .. plz think about my suggestions and improve in next several updates if possible and thanks again for reading my suggestions. ... Best of luck.

Worst game ever, First of all you can't move the turret up and down which sucks A LOT, The game GUI and HUD sucks, It's really bad, It looks like a game from 2005, And when you aim at someone the turret sensetivity somehow increases significantly, I'm playing at 60 fps but the enemy vehicle is extremely laggy, My internet connection is ultra fast, But the enemy vehicle is so laggy, Game needs a lot of work and improvements. I do n't recommend it to anyone.

Spent real money on this game and tried to play today and my profile is gone and all purchases are gone. I would like either this fixed or a refund. The game creator wont do anything. This is a rip off company that steals money. Been over a week and they will not do anything right.

title: Drum Pad Machine - Beat Maker & Music Maker
description:
Drum Pad Machine is a popular DJ beats music mixer. Create music with the DJ app in a few clicks by your own. Be a beat maker, mix loops and record your own melodies with super pads on the launchpad. Use your imagination to discover a new world of hip-hop tracks by beatbox maker.

We make music production easy! With the help of the Drum Pad Machine soundboard, you can not only learn the basics of music creation, but mix music beats as well. A great variety of sound effects will help you to create appropriate chords and use them both for piano and guitar.

What you can do with DJ music mixer:
• Make music on a device like a beat maker;
• Compose tracks, make beats and create mixtapes;
• Record sounds by beats maker;
• Share music and songs with the world.

How does the drumpad machine work?
First, you will see a colorful field with various buttons. Each new launchpad sector is a new sound for creating music. Buttons of the same color play similar sounds. Try our music making app, develop beat making skills and create your own hits!

You can use many sound packs for making music beats. Choose an individual theme for beats music. All samples and sounds are developed for you by professional musicians. Beatboxing is easy and exciting even for newcomers. You can use drum machine anywhere: at home, in a music studio, in street jams or during a long trip.

The app suits both pro beat makers and budding music makers. It has detailed tutorials that will teach you step by step how to create and mix music on a drum machine.

It won't take very long for you to feel like a real DJ. Create beats on a drum machine, make, mix and play music and share it with your friends!

Available styles of music & beats:
‣ Trap
‣ Dubstep
‣ EDM
‣ House
‣ Drum & Bass
‣ Hip-Hop
‣ Electro
‣ Future Bass

Drum Pad Machine is a handy, creating music mixer app for playing in real time, as well as for creating and playing loops. Create tracks 24/7 as a drum pads guru, record hits like a real music maker and share them with your friends!

This rapper soundboard app is a powerful, easy-to-use tool to get the best music experience:
- get professional music samples;
- try loops creation with a sequencer;
- change tempo and create sounds via beatbox recorder;
- use launch pad finger drumming option;
- record your own tracks and share recordings;
- get tips and tricks by watching videos and tutorials to master your beatmaker skills in music production.

Drum Pad Machine is a real piece of music production and a very entertaining drum game! Make sick beats and create music in a matter of minutes with drum pads! Drop the beat!

Be a beat maker with Drum Pad Machine!

Love the app? Rate us! Have a question? Contact us via the Support section.
comments: Amazing. Couldn't like it more! I like the fact that you can create and record your own music. I also like that there are tutorials availiable to anyone who wants to become a 'pro' I am really impressed with this. I have downloaded many other music making apps, but none have been as good as this! I recommend this to anyone!

Very Awesome! Sadly, I would like to exceed the ratings' limit. I suggest that, the A&B drum pad could be played at once, that you don't have to click the change button "A(B)". All in all, it's great! I am grateful. Btw, I am just playing it for free and have no knowledge about drum pad. I am just a passerby

Amazing music! It's a fine piece of art, multiple choices of genre, but I'd like to suggest a new music genre or type. I want a custom DooM soundtrack, DooM is a game for rip and tearing, well. It's basically a fighting game but with tons of blood, you're in hell and you fight demons, all that stuff! And the music is amazing. It is metal. And I wanted to make my own DooM soundtrack with this amazing app! Please read this, And thank you!

This app is free. But they have now added so many ads that you cannot change what it on your screen without getting one. Launch the app. Get an ad. Then an ad banner on the bottom. Download a new drum pack. Get an ad. Load that pack. Get an ad. Then ad banner on bottom permanently. Back out of drum pack. Get an ad. Download new one. Get an ad. The cycle continues until you buy the premium version. Feels dirty.

*EDIT: IF YOU PAID FOR NO ADS GET A REFUND.*Simple and fun! Minor issues plague it from being as great. Random delays in sounds is a big issue especially when recording. Major issue is not having the ability to have more granular control over tempo. If I want to slow a beat of 125bpm to half speed, I have to settle for either 60 or 65, so the pre-recorded rhythmic sounds will either be to slow or too fast. I already pay annually and would gladly pay more for a "Pro" mode for this feature alone.

title: High Blood Pressure Guide
description:
Everything You Need to Know About High Blood Pressure (Hypertension)!

Learn What to know about high blood pressure!

High blood pressure (also referred to as HBP, or hypertension) is when your blood pressure, the force of blood flowing through your blood vessels, is consistently too high.
descriptionHTML:
Everything You Need to Know About High Blood Pressure (Hypertension)!

Learn What to know about high blood pressure!

High blood pressure (also referred to as HBP, or hypertension) is when your blood pressure, the force of blood flowing through your blood vessels, is consistently too high.

title: TRANSFORMERS: Forged to Fight
description:
Calling all Autobots, Decepticons, Predacons and Maximals!

Join Optimus Prime, Megatron, Bumblebee, Waspinator, Rhinox, Grimlock, Soundwave and many more of your favorite bots in the battle for supremacy where Transformers universes collide. This exciting action-fighting RPG brings the heroic storytelling and spectacular action from over 30 years of Transformers history to your mobile device!

Features:
• Collect iconic bots from the entire Transformers universe
• Battle other players with devastating special attacks, ranged blasting, destructible terrain and huge 360° arenas
• Team up with your friends, forge alliances and battle in global events
• Set a gauntlet of bots and defenses to protect your base, get revenge on those that attack and raid enemy bases
• Deploy away teams to score epic loot


Roll Out!

WiFi or cellular connection is required to play.
Optional in-app purchases available.

Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/forgedtofight
Follow us on Twitter: @ForgedtoFight 
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: youtube.com/TransformersForgedtoFight

TRANSFORMERS is a trademark of Hasbro and is used with permission. © 2019 Hasbro. Licensed by Hasbro. TRANSFORMERS: Forged to Fight software © 2019 Kabam Games, Inc. Developed by Kabam. All rights reserved.

summary: Join your favorite Bots in battle where Transformers universes collide!
developerAddress: 1118 Alberni Street, Suite 200, Vancouver, v6e1a5, Canada
recentChanges:
New Features
• NEW BOT Necrotronus is coming!
• Titan Fragments - Collect a brand new currency that gives you access to previously unavailable bots
• Experience the thrilling conclusion to Act 4, Act 4 Chapter 4 and face off against the toughest challenge in story mode yet!
Bug Fixes
• Fixed an issue with the Thai language not displaying correctly
• Fixed an issue with missing strings in multiple languages
• Addressed incorrect Forge preview when Forging over level 100
comments: Lag, slow loading and high prices, this game lags so bad that sometimes I can't even chat, the timer should not run during loading in a raid. Sometimes it takes 3-4 minutes to load a fight and I lose my raid because it takes so long to load. Startup takes 7-8 minutes The shop items are expensive for what you get for your money. No bonus items really for spending more. Most games the more money you spend the more you get in bonuses. Not this game. If my husband didn't play I would quit.

The game as a whole is good even though there are countless hackers threatening to destroy it if their demands are not met but regardless the game as a hole is glorious as it stands and should not be tampered with under any circumstance unless it is by the developer and the only reason why it would ever be considered hard is because a bunch of morons ruined it by hacking.

My favorite game but I have 2 problems: 1) I bought a mobile with 90Hz display and the game doesn't support it. 2) Very often I get the error message "Problem connecting to network". Only the game didn't respond. The other apps like Chrome, Facebook etc which needs internet connection works flawlessly.

Most of the people playing this game say that it's slow. I can assure you that it isn't, their internet just must not be that great and playing the game on tablet or bluestacks is probably a better option than a tiny phone trying to render the game. The story is meh, but the game barely focuses on it. You also should care more about upgrading your characters because sooner or later you are going to be weak fighting insanely hard robots due to the game assuming you want to grind or jump and die.

I love this game, but the data consumption is much. I would like this game better if you add more characters like Bulkhead, Alpha Trion, Micronus Prime, and other primes, Steel Jaw, Strongarm, Fallen, Blurr, Polarclaw, Crasher, Octopunch, Crazybolt, Shadelock, Clawtrap, Glacius, Hammer, and other Minicons like Fixit, Jetstorm, Slipstream, Aerobolt, Ransack, etc. The game would be more interesting with more challenging modes. I hope you will read these suggestions I have made.

title: Turbo Dismount™
description:
The legendary crash simulator is now on Google Play!

Perform death-defying motor stunts, crash into walls, create traffic pile-ups of epic scale - and share the fun!

Turbo Dismount™ is a kinetic tragedy about Mr. Dismount and the cars who love him. It is the official sequel to the wildly popular and immensely successful personal impact simulator - Stair Dismount™. 

FEATURES:
* Flinch-inducing crash physics
* Crunchy sound effects
* Delicious slow-mo replay system
* Multiple vehicles: cars, trucks, construction vehicles, a skateboard...
* Multiple levels, obstacle types and characters
* Tweak levels to your liking!
* Customize your character and the vehicles with your own photos!
* Game controller support!
* Leaderboards and achievements
* Smooth full resolution 4x MSAA visuals on SHIELD Tablet

Turbo Dismount is the most convincing vehicular personal impact simulation seen on Android!

Follow Mr. Dismount on facebook.com/MrDismount
Follow Secret Exit on Twitter: twitter.com/secretexit

Dismounting (turbocharged or regular) is not to be attempted at home or outside, and should be left to trained professionals. Secret Exit does not recommend or condone dismount attempts outside 3D computer simulations.

comments: I love this game! I like the crushes! Everybody and body part of our shelf! We can change any vehicle we want! Can change our shelf! We want to! It's FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This game is very awesome, there is a slow motion feature, maps, millions of cars to destroy, and more, you can even get a fighter jet, almost like a F-22 Raptor, with cool cities in the background as well, but even better,you can preform dangerous stunts, its really cool.

Very fun, has a bunch of levels, cars, and hats my favorite car is the bumper car and magnum. recommend you get this if you want to see destruction. Edit: And I would want to see another update. Have not seen one for a while, if you are making another game I will definitely play it.

Love this game absolutely amazing. I found out about this game from a lot youtubers and honestly that made me want to play it so I decided to play it and it was great. Graphics are amazing, I love how you can turn the replay into slow motion and everything else! 11 out of 10 perfect.😁❤🤯
Crash! Bang! Crunch! I love the sound effects! I watched Jacksepticeye play this, and while this is more limited, it's still very much the game he played. So nice to see it on mobile!

title: Deer Hunter 2018
description:
From the creators of Deer Hunter 2014 comes the world’s greatest hunting experience in 2020 that targets your heart and mind:

Return to the Wild. PURSUE, HUNT, REPEAT.

SHOOT LIKE A PRO
In this hunting simulator, we take you straight to the action. Line up your sights, aim for vital organs & hone your skills for the perfect hunt. A Trophy Hunt.

HUNT ACROSS THE GLOBE
Pursue trophies & survive while you hunt in breathtaking new locations every month, across the globe, from Alaska to Zimbabwe

SEASONAL EVENTS
3 Weeks of all you can HUNT. It’s Hunting Season - Get Huntin’ !

MULTIPLE GAME MODES
Go back in time with Historical Hunts, go underwater with Spear Fishing, Hunt with Man’s best friend and or get fiercely competitive with Target Shooting Events!

BAG BIG GAME ANIMALS
Hunt animals so real they nearly jump off the screen! Track down and hunt the world’s most exotic and elusive animals.

THE HUNTER BECOMES THE HUNTED
Hunt predators before they hunt you.

COLLECT HUNTING TROPHIES
Compete to brag and hunt the biggest trophy animals with Google Play achievements and leaderboards!

AUGMENT YOUR ARSENAL
Collect firearms, add scopes, magazines, barrels, and stocks as you perfect your weapons before each hunt.


Deer Hunter 2018 includes auto-renewable subscriptions.

• Silver Subscription: $0.99USD / week (or local equivalent) or $1.99USD / month (or local equivalent)
• Gold Subscription: $1.99USD / week (or local equivalent) or $4.99USD / month (or local equivalent) including a 7 day free trial or $12.99USD / 3 months (or local equivalent) or $19.99USD / 6 months (or local equivalent)

All benefits are described in game.

Subscriptions are available via in app purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew at the applicable subscription price at the end of the subscription period until you cancel your subscription. Payment for the subscription period you selected will be charged to your Google account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. You can cancel your subscription at any time by accessing  your Google Account Settings and selecting to cancel your subscription. After canceling, you will be responsible for paying the subscription fee for the current active applicable subscription period.

Here are the links to our privacy policy and terms of service:
Privacy Policy: http://www.glu.com/privacy
Terms of use: http://www.glu.com/terms

---------------------------------------------

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.  

Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobile’s Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobile’s Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

developerAddress:
875 Howard, Suite 100
San Francisco CA 94103
recentChanges:
• This 2020 we bring you the Hunting Season Experience! From Open Season to Big Game Hunting, top the leaderboard & win exciting rewards!
• Bug Fixes: We've optimized our game to improve stability and make the user experience seamless!
comments: Literally, BLOWN AWAY!!! I have never experienced a game like this. Deer Hunter is so basic about hunting in such a beautifully detailed environment. And the Events are just amazing! Every single thing in the game makes it more special to play everyday. It stands apart from the crowd of other hunting games and expresses itself in such a beautiful way. The graphics are totally awesome, the mechanics are convenient and the Western music keeps my enthusiasm up! Just change D.H 2018 to 2019. Thanks.

I love the game but can we get more energy like one every minute and why I love it the hunting is great and the dogs are good but can we get more heat in the suits, and more chum, bait, and fishing energy please make the wepons cheaper oh and it takes a while to load but I think that it is worth it please make these improvements.

It's a fun game, I highly reccomend getting it. I'm not sure if it's just me, but I get logged out of the game whenever I try a mission in a different region. The main problems for me is the loading screen, it's so long, I have to wait like, 3 minutes to be able to play the game. I don't really mind the ads, they aren't very annoying, and the game's scenery is kinda cool to look at. Overall, it's pretty great, it's my go-to game to install whenever I get a new mobile device.

Great game to be honest. I love hunting the animals and it gives me a surreal experience of hunting. But as soon as you hop online to competitive shooting things take a turn for the worst, people can't compensate at getting better so what do they do? They hack, ever since I got into cts it's been hacker after hacker scoring near impossible scores like 30000, 70000, 50000 etc please fix this, make a program that bans all hackers as soon as a hack is detected and never let those goons get away.

It's an awesome game. It's like real hunting just on the go!!! Its a really fun game, nothing to complain. ITS AWESOME!!! Its still awesome in 2020!!! 5 star city!!! Huntsman101 level 7 region 2 in about 15 min

Lookout Premium

► Includes all the functionality of Lookout Basic, plus additional mobile security & antivirus features to protect your mobile device, data and privacy. 
►NEW! Safe Wi-Fi: Be alerted when a Wi-Fi network you join is dangerous or under attack
►Breach Report: Get timely alerts whenever a company, app or service you use has a data breach along with how best to secure your data

►Privacy Advisor: See what personal information can be accessed by your apps

Lookout Premium Plus comes with all of the Premium functionality, plus identity theft protection.

LOOKOUT IDENTITY THEFT PROTECTION
► Cyber Watch: Monitor your personal and financial information and get alerted whenever anything is found exposed online
► Social Security Number (SSN) Watch: Get a history of names, addresses, and other records associated with your SSN and proactive notifications of changes.
► Social Media Watch: Protect your online reputation and monitor your social media accounts. 

IDENTITY RESTORATION & INSURANCE
► 24/7 Restoration Assistance: In the event of identity theft, certified ID Restoration Experts are available 24/7 to assist with the time-consuming process of recovering and restoring your identity
►$1M Identity Theft Insurance: Premium Plus subscribers are backed by Identity Theft Insurance that covers up to $1M in damages and legal fees with $0 deductible**
► Lost Wallet Recovery: If your wallet is lost or stolen, restoration experts will work quickly with you to contact document issuers to cancel and reorder credit cards and identification contents

About Lookout Inc.
Visit our website https://www.lookout.com to learn more about us and our mobile security, antivirus and identity protection products.

Insurance coverage is provided by a third-party and is subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions of the insurance policy available at www.lookout.com/legal. Lookout is not a licensed insurer or insurance agent.

recentChanges: This version of Lookout includes support for Android 11. It also includes enhanced root detection capabilities.
comments: Great App it works in the background and this appears to be done randomly. I say that because every so often I will get a report on my phone stating the number of Apps which are safe. Last report I had 518 Apps I didn't realise I had that many Apps! I feel secure with Lookout running in the background and you can do a manual scan whenever you want to. All this is free unless you want to go one better with Lookout Premium. I have thought about maybe moving to Lookout Premium with all the scams.

Constantly crashes. Please do something about this. I have sent many feesback reports and still no help. I really like the app but i dont want to waste my money and time on an app that does not work. I also think someone is monitoring my phone and I can not receive messages from certain people. Please help. Update Oct. 30, 2020:: When I tried to go to the link you gave me, I was redirected to ebay. WTH

I have the full version of this app, so it doesn't contains ads. Additionally, I'm running the app on a Samsung Galaxy S9+, with no problems! It has already helped me to find my device several times, (as I have misplaced it several times, or simply forgotten where I placed it)! However, you should know that the location, lock, and wipe your phone doe come as a built in features of the basic Google suite that comes with your Android phone! I got this app for it's Additional features!

This app is garbage. In about the last 6 years and 3 phones, the scream feature worked only once. The website always says its not going through bc of lack service or permission or it's off but it always goes off like 30 min after I find it myself in an area where it has full service and battery. Would give 0 stars if I could. Giving breach updates isn't "security", working features are. Uninstalled.

I haven't had any negative experiences with this app. I like that it scans apps as you install them and let's you know whether those apps are safe. I also like that it does background scans of all my apps periodically. Overall great app for security.

A few IMPROVEMENTS
Thanks for playing!

comments: Great game! It's definitely a puzzle game. It takes several tries to figure out how to beat each level. That's what I love about it! I paid the 2.99 to turn off the ads. Finally completed the last level. Took forever! Please add more levels! UPDATE: It's been a couple of months now since I finished the last level. Mind you, I don't know when the last level was actually completed by boom bit, but I keep getting updates for all of their games, but no new levels. Give us some new levels, man!

The game is good, but very repetitive - just like the ads. You basically have to keep doing the same level over and over to earn enough coin to upgrade your car enough to pass that level. I paid to remove the ads as they were REALLY annoying. Even when you pay to remove the ads, you still get ads trying to get you to pay more money to unlock vehicles. I completed this game with the 2 cars that come by default within a few hours. Just waiting for new levels to be added. Not sure they will though.

While my son I enjoyed playing the game, the ads can be a little bit ridiculous but I do understand it's a free game but still. I'm glad I didn't pay $299 for the no ads because there's not enough levels, with that said level 11 the vertical jump with the mountain yeah that can go to hell. I like a hard game but if I'm ready to throw the phone that's when I quit playing a game. only reason I will keep it is because my son likes playing it and he wants to unlock the rest of the free cars.

Phenomenal Game but its very clear its unfinished. Level 11 is definitely meant to be a cash grab. Its 10 orders of magnitude more difficult than all the levels before it. Then level 12 is the final level. You can beat it over and over but the "next level" is always just the same level 12. Also, the ads are horrific!

Heavy on ads, and level 11 designed to being in the revenue by being nearly impossible so you just watch a ton of ads or cough up the $$, but that doesn't solve how hard the level is. It also has some kind of memory leak that requires a hard close every so often. Otherwise it can generally be fun to play.

title: GPCs Cardiovascular
description:
GPCs es grupo de aplicaciones indispensables para todo aquel que requiera un acceso fácil y rápido a las guías de práctica clínica. Hoy en día el ejercicio de las ciencias de la salud y la práctica clínica demanda la necesidad de apegarse a las evidencias, por lo que esta serie de aplicaciones te ahorra tiempo y esfuerzo. En todo momento puedes acceder a las guías de referencia rápida ya que no requiere el uso de Internet, además su lector de PDF nativo te permite repasar la guía en segundos sin modificar su formato original para tu mayor comodidad. Usé las guías de referencia rápida con el fin de hacer más ágil tu consulta y mantener un bajo consumo de memoria por parte de la aplicación.

title: SoundCloud - Play Music, Audio & New Songs
description:
🌟 What’s next in music is first on SoundCloud 🌟

SoundCloud is more than a streaming service, it’s an open global community for anyone to upload any sound for immediate discovery. 

Be the first to hear new tracks, connect directly with fellow fans and your favorite artists in real time, and support the future of music with every play, like, repost and comment.

Get SoundCloud FREE:

- Access the most diverse catalog of content 
- Discover millions of emerging and established artists, DJs and podcasters
- Listen to music that exists nowhere else
- Get suggested tracks based on your listening habits
- Explore SoundCloud Charts for the best music or podcasts in each genre
- Connect directly with artists and fellow listeners
- Create playlists for any occasion
- Find new music faster with curated playlists 

Listen to the biggest hits and discover what’s next in music

SoundCloud is the world's largest music and audio streaming platform with more than 200 million tracks and a global community of 20 million-plus artists from every creative corner of the world. On SoundCloud you can discover music that exists nowhere else – DJ sets, hand-curated playlists, remixes and freestyles – right next to chart-topping albums and mainstream releases.

Our massive catalog has the biggest hits in pop, hip-hop, rap, electronic, rock, techno, classical, jazz and podcasts, but also the sub-genres and songs within these communities that you’ll be hearing about next year.  

Find and connect with your community

SoundCloud is the only place where artists and fans and curators collide to push music culture forward together. You can connect to emerging artists and today’s superstars directly and in real time, and hear their new songs within seconds of them being shared. Or follow our curator’s community profiles (our take on genres), so the trending tracks and playlists our plugged-in music experts are posting will land in your stream.

Support the artists you love

Fuel the success of emerging and established artists. Every like, play, comment, and repost resonates and establishes a creator’s reputation, provides motivation, and amplifies their reach. Every listen and subscription purchased on SoundCloud puts more money in artist’s pockets, empowering and enabling them to continue to create and push music culture forward. 

Subscribe to SoundCloud Go+ for premium listening

With SoundCloud Go+, you can get access to every track on SoundCloud, from the biggest hits what’s next in music. With offline listening, you can take your music with you wherever you go, and with no ads, nothing stands between you and your favorite tracks. You can get even closer to a creator’s intended sound and vision with high quality audio. 

SOUNDCLOUD GO:

- Save unlimited tracks for offline listening
- Ad-free listening
- Your subscription helps financially support the millions of creators who are starting and growing their careers on SoundCloud
- Try 30 days free, then $5.99/month*

SOUNDCLOUD GO+:

- Save unlimited tracks for offline listening
- Access full catalog, no previews 
- Get ad-free listening
- High quality audio
- Your subscription helps financially support the millions of creators who are starting and growing their careers on SoundCloud
- Try 30 days free, then $9.99/month**

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

SoundCloud Blog: http://blog.soundcloud.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soundcloud
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/soundcloud
Tumblr: http://soundcloud.tumblr.com
Instagram: http://instagram.com/soundcloud

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACK?

The more you tell us, the better SoundCloud gets.

http://help.soundcloud.com
https://twitter.com/SCsupport

SoundCloud is available in English, Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Swedish.

Privacy Policy: https://soundcloud.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: https://soundcloud.com/terms-of-use

developerAddress: Rheinsberger Str. 76, 10115 Berlin, Germany
comments: With the recent update of the past month I just finally updated, the app is slightly annoying. Mainly do to I can't change music from notifications. I had to open the app to swap left/right and more than half of the time, I can't click the music next to a playing song. Again, I had to go inside the app and swap to it. Until this is fix, I'm giving it 3 stars. It's a good app, but the notifications bug is quite a pain to to.

Ok so it is ok but the ads are getting worse, I would understand two ads (where one lasts 5 sec) but each lasting 30 seconds? Rlly? Before I could listen to the music offline and there were less ads but now it's just a total mess. To close those annoying ads I have to back out of the app completely. Edit: I already know that they get paid for ads, it's just that there's more than before. Also the ads are very long, especially for an app like this, where you listen to music...

With the current laptop I'm using I've had to continuously check back onto youtube to unpause the music when i click onto something, just typing and sending would pause the video... This app is wonderful, i never had a disruption other than adds and their only 1-2 so its not that bothersome! Thank you! I can now listen to my music in peace <3

Normally a great app for listening to music but in these last couple months, the app has been unusable. Major bugs keeping me from searching for an artist or entering a playlist. The app frezes and just acts like it doesn't know what it's suppose to do. I used to love soundcloud but I can't keep using it if continues to have these bugs even months after they started showing up.

Sound cloud is great because not only can you enjoy a vast range of music variety, but you can also upload your own music on there as an artist. And also offers features such as repost which allows you to get your music heard by hundreds of thousands of listeners. This is probably one of the best platforms to build a fan base and sell your music. I would recommend this platform to any artist or anyone who loves music.

title: Papa Pear Saga
description:
Papa Pear Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

It's a Papa Fiesta! Bounce your way through this unique puzzle game.

Take aim and unleash Papa Pear to bounce and boing around a wacky world of fruity pegs, hazelnuts and crazy chillies. Exciting adventures await you in the Fruity Forest, Pearsylvania and beyond. BOING!

Take on this epic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Papa Pear Saga is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

------------------------------- 

Papa Pear Saga features: 

• Pearfect graphics that will have you bouncing for joy 
• Boosters and power ups to help with those challenging levels 
• Special items to unlock by completing levels 
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
• Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet

------------------------------- 

Already a fan of Papa Pear Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news: 
facebook.com/PapaPearSaga 
twitter.com/PapaPearSaga 

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Papa Pear Saga! 

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy.  If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

Enjoy a fast, fun and smooth gameplay! We have been improving the game so that nothing keeps you from having a pear-fect Papa Pear experience! Our goal: bring a 100% glitch free game!

comments: Needs events or something to make power ups easier to get Some levels are damn near impossible without them and the gold is expensive af. ** love the game overall! Have been playing for a long time! I've made it past over 300 levels but this entire time it's kind of been a lackluster game compared to some of 'your' others

Its always challenging to figure out how to defeat a level. The only levels I really dont enjoy are the ones where there are chains over the buckets and you have to hit a matching color "face" thing to open it and the "face" changes color and changes which bucket it opens.That one is too confusing trying to figure out the pattern without wasting pears to shoot.

Simple and fun,but there are some REALLY hard levels that can take even days to beat,such a simple and long game shouldn't have such hard levels. There should be an option to skip levels for free if,for example,you fail to beat it in 10 - 15 lives or maybe even less.

I click the little circle on the top right corner and it says to put my fb information and when I do , says invalid token access .. what does that mean? why can't I see which level my friends are on ? Please fix

It's an entertaining and addictive game, but it has some major cons. You only get 5 lives and you have to wait a certain amount of time before they regenerate, even though this game is clearly designed to make you constantly fail and replay levels. 5 lives is not enough, a game like this shouldn't even be using the "lives" format, it just ruins the experience and makes me stop playing since I have no more lives. This game is all about luck, not skill, which is extremely annoying and lazy.

title: Archero
description:
Archer Heroes!

Enter a world where existence itself is eliminate you! You are the Lone Archer, the only force able to resist and defeat the oncoming waves of evil.
Step up, stack up awesome skills and fight like your life depends on it, for the never-ending waves of enemies will never give up. And remember, once you die... the only way is to start all again! So be careful!

Enjoy creating countless combinations of unique skills all designed to help you survive. Crawl your way through different worlds facing relentless monsters and obstacles. 

Key Features:
	•	Random and unique skills to help you crawl these dungeons. 
	•	Explore beautiful worlds and hundreds of maps in this new universe. 
	•	Thousands of never-seen-before monsters and mind-boggling obstacles to 
                defeat
	•	Level-up and equip yourself with powerful equipment to increase your stats. 

If you have any questions, feel free to ask us anytime at: archero@habby.fun

comments: Kind of ok at the beginning, you can level up fast, progress quick, and upgrade your gear easy, in the beginning that is, after a while everything hard to the point where you can't progress at all. That wouldn't be a problem normally, you just have to git gud right? Not in this case, at the higher leves you're at the mercy of rng to get you the best buffs, and to drop you the items needed to evolve/upgrade your gear, which is insanely tedious and grindy to do if you don't want to spend any money

I have been playing for a long time but am feeling very stuck as new stuff is added. There are almost too many items now. I never get the items I have any more so I haven't been able to upgrade them. The new character evolution system is awful. Way to hard to get the character shards you want. You can get them randomly as rewards but there are a ton of characters or you get the soulstones to buy them in a once a day dungeon. So I really can't evolve the character I want.

Been playing about a year now and it Use to be a pay to win game but they've made it to where you can simply wait a long time to be able to summon them. They stay on top of their updates, (and surprisingly I'm always pleased about it ). Only problems I can see with the game is that you can spend 10 enegry on a event to get runes and when i complete I only get around 1-4 runes. Not even enough to forge. Also I think the levels need to show how much xp is needed to get the next level up in game.

Used to be my favorite... Until it wasn't. A bit bloated making progression slow but that's not the issue. Main issue right now is crashing. Loved doing daily events, but it's hardly working out anymore, depleting 10-15 stamina, then the app shuts down making the event unavailable upon reopening. Have been an avidly player for well over a year, but lately it's been a let down. Events and co-op were my main stay... Not so much anymore. It's been cool archers! Edit: Player ID 1-3221180

It was fun at first, but I quickly got to a point where it is almost impossible to advance without spending money. After spending more on this game than what a couple brand new console games would cost, it's still almost impossible. This is one of the worst cases of developer greed that I've ever seen. Even the newest update looks to be designed to get people to spend even more money. The game just isn't fun anymore.

comments: You remember 1942 on your Commodore C64? This is nothing like it. All enemies and bullets seem to be magnetic and you basically have no chance to 'win' this game. This is another game that's just trying to squeeze some money out of the player for exactly zero value. They even offer airplanes for $49.99. You can buy a proper game for that kind of money. Ten cents would be too much and I'm sorry for everyone spending money on this

To the developer of this game, you need to fix the score of the PvP game it is not right .No matter how you fight the opponent by looking the time and the score it suddenly the other opponent had a higher score even if you are ahead. How can you explain that sometimes the score is right and you can tell that you are losing because the end of the game its just stuck that you cant even move. Very bad pvp games.

Had 300.000 gold, 3150 gems when they just disappeared when I started playing today. Thats a big, big flaw that needs to be corrected fast. It takes some time building up alot of gems and gold. A bug like that is unacceptable. I am very disappointed. As of 3Sept cannot access PVP mode, special event mode, as well as other game play modes really???, especially when it says server not available. Your E-mail for support is not valid. Fix these bugs.

At first, the game is great. Good old 1942, however after longer play you realise how unbalanced the game & reward system are. If you don't buy blue diamonds for real money, forget about getting high quality planes/weapons. Playing long hours only gives you minimum coins or diamonds (if you buy them for coins). But the most annoying is the lucky wheel - 1 ticket costs 5000 coins and you usually (8\10) win only 10 diamonds which is minimum. Too many more negatives to mention, hence 2stars.

I love this game but this is the fourth time it has crashed on me and taken over a years worth of watching videos to build up my aircrafts. I'm guessing this is what happens when you do not spend money on the app.

title: High Blood Pressure Pro
description:
High BP Pro: Self Care App on High Blood Pressure Symptoms & High BP Care

 
>>>What does this High Blood Pressure app offer:-

•	The High BP Self-Care app is a very helpful tool for people suffering from uncontrolled hypertension. 

•	The app gives you specific information about the different types of High Blood Pressure. 

•	Manage your High Blood Pressure episodes by adopting the preventive strategies.

•	The food articles that triggers or relieves High Blood Pressure are worth adopting in your High Blood Pressure management plan.

•	The Behavioral and Relaxation therapies that one needs to adopt in High Blood Pressure are must for long-term control.

•	The High BP Self-Care app is a way of taking control of treatment of High Blood Pressure in your own hands.


>>>Types of High Blood Pressure Patterns covered-

•	Primary High Blood Pressure

•	Secondary High Blood Pressure


>>>People’s health habits and their lifestyle can enhance or compromise their health.

>>>Care app provides information about health behaviors and lifestyle changes that are aimed at stopping or reversing the widely prevalent medical disorders in the population.

>>>It also gives details about the causes, symptoms, complications and prevention activities of chronic and fatal diseases like sugar, high blood pressure, heart attack, recurrent headache, cancer etc.

>>>To this day, self-care app guides you to manage the diseases and improve your well-being by taking control of your own health.

>>>Take your time to leave any feedback / comment for developer to help improve this app from the rate app option.

>>>We wish you good luck, much success and knowledge gain from your learning to prevent High Blood Pressure with self-care.

>>>For tech support or any feedback, feel free to drop us an email at helpdesk.showartzz@gmail.com

>>>Please do not forget to give us a 5 star if you like our app. We work hard to bring out quality questions to benefit every learner. We totally appreciate for your continuous feedback and choosing our High Blood Pressure Self Care App.

title: Banana Kong
description:
A thrilling ride through jungle, caves and treetops. 
Play as Kong! Banana Kong!


Run, jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Banana Kong to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls.

Ride the boar or fly with the toucan to overcome dangerous obstacles like massive boulders, crocodiles, piranhas and boiling lava. Nature can be a cruel enemy… 

While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to outrun your friends! Thanks to full Game Services integration you can see your friends best distance right in the game. Compare your high scores and unlock achievements while improving your playing style. 

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this neverending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly.

Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles or take alternative routes like the deep underground cave area or treetops. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game. 


Features: 

- Cloud Save
- HD Display support
- Full Game Services integration
- Ride animals
- One thumb controls
- 10 seconds from launching the game to playing it.

comments: It is a great app, very responsive and a moderate amount of ads, just one tiny thing: the resolution for a 10:16 screen at least on my moto g8 hasn't been supported and the game looks cropped thus making it impossible to see the ground (or the pitfalls) overall the music the variety of stages and rewards are pretty rad, highly addictive

I remember playing this game so much in the past I really loved and till now I still love it yeh maybe the controls are not the best but it is a old game it will have those issues I played this game for more than 5 hours just bringing back memories of me playing this game overall amazing game

*PLEASE READ* I guess this game hasn't been updated in years because I remember playing it a long time ago, but please fix the bug where when I get a Google Play achievement for the game, the game freezes while the notification is on my screen. This is a recurring issue with old games that haven't been updated for years. Great game but doesn't work for me right now
Ads will not close and the back button will not close the ads. Ads continue to show up after every game and I'm unable to click the little x to close the ad. I have to exit the game and reopen it.

Several things need to be changed. In the HATS section the names 'Cowboy', 'Mining Hat', 'Heavenly Kong', and 'Afro' should be changed to 'Cowboy Hat', 'Mining Helmet' (with a lamp that turns on in the dark cave), 'Heavenly Halo', and 'Disco Afro'. In the PARACHUTES section, the word 'treasure' in 'Treasure Map' is misspelled. In the POWER-UPS section, the 1-UP heart should have angel wings and a halo. But VERY EXCITING!!!

comments: It's a good app but it keeps pausing and then it starts to.. Glitch? But when it does it makes me really mad and then it's really hard to try and fix without it pausing and going again and it doesn't have a couple of songs that I really like but other than that this is a great app speaking of which I'm actually listening to music from your app right now called karma😅😂but I do recommend this app and it doesn't include any signing in and it's actually free!!

I honestly love the app. No ads to interrupt the experience, and you can add 1 song to a playlist to keep looping it. And you can add songs from other apps! I recommend the app to anyone who enjoys listening to music while also using other social media apps and games! Though, the only thing that bugs me is if there is 1 spelling mistake in the search, it wont give you results. Other than that, I love the app!

THANK YOU!! dude theres NOTHING wrong with this app and ive been looking for something like it for a long time! Ive had this app for a year now and the ads arent annoying at all! Theres only ONE! How awesome is that?! You also get the option to use local audios and its AMAZING! EVEN EQ! theres an option to loop, favorite and MORE! 5 STARS on yelp. you deserve it.

Definitely recommended. Highly. I've found a lot, if not, all my music here. It even plays the music over apps as you play games. No bugs, glitches, or audio issues. This is the perfect music app in my opinion with no confusing navigation.

I love this app! I didnt know how to create my own playlist at first but I eventually figured it out after a few months of use. Awesome app! Except for one problem. Ads ads ads. Too many ads. Wish I could give 4 and a half stars though. But its still awesome. Another thing. I discovered the music keeps pausing and playing.

title: Google Play Music
description:
Google Play Music provides free, ad-supported radio for what you’re doing, how you’re feeling, or what you want to hear. Instantly start radio stations based on songs, artists, or albums, or browse by genre, mood, activity, decade, and more. Bring your own music collection with you by uploading 50,000 of your own songs; then listen to them across Android, iOS, and the web, for free.

Subscribe to get on-demand access to millions of songs and download anything to listen even when you’re not connected - or sign up for the family plan on Android to provide access for up to six family members for one low price. Plus, subscriptions come with YouTube Music Premium membership, so you can enjoy YouTube Music ad-free, in the background, and offline.

Free features:
*Radio curated by experts for anything you want to hear
*Store up to 50,000 songs from your personal music collection
*Discover and subscribe to podcasts
*Smart recommendations based on your taste
*Listen on Android, iOS, and the web

Subscription-only features:
*The family plan, where up to six family members can enjoy Google Play Music for one low price.
*On-demand access to over 35 million songs
*YouTube Music Premium membership (see music.youtube.com/music_premium for details)
*Download music to your device and listen when you’re not connected
*Ad-free, uninterrupted listening

Learn where Google Play Music is available at https://support.google.com/googleplay/?p=availability

Learn more about Google Play Music at https://play.google.com/music

comments: It was all fine until I had to transfer to YouTube Music, which to listen to music properly, requires a subscription. But YouTube didn't transfer my music, it just didn't work, which is frustrating. They don't care about people's satisfaction in listening to music, they only care about gaining money through subscriptions. Google Play Music was good, see that key word, was. YouTube Music doesn't need my money so I could listen to my music. It needs better function.

It was working fine. I could happily listen to music offline. I honestly think that YouTube Music is really pointless since there's already a bunch of songs, covers, and instrumentals on YouTube itself. This is only getting a 1 star review and I have no actual regrets. Honestly who was dense enough to think of this idea, they should've known that no one would like this idea, it's such a fraud. If we now need internet to listen to music then that's really dumb. Have fun reading all the reviews

Used the app a lot from the get go. Worked perfectly. I put all of my purchased/downloaded music on it for about 3-4 years. Then, the app was "moved".... along with all of my music. 3 years worth of music erased completely. I'm pretty disgusted.... so much, that I don't even want to give YouTube music a chance once I saw that my music wouldn't transfer. Not one song. All of my playlist titles are there... but no songs. I've tried multiple times and searched extensively. It's a complete RIP off.

I have been using this app for years, even I changed phones. And I am happy to use it even when offline. The last time I used this app was yesterday before updating. Then I realized the app is discontinued and becomes Youtube Music. The wonderful memories and arranged music just gone. Well, it is nice while it lasted and it's time to move on. Goodbye.

This app was perfect. Loved the format. Very user friendly. Love the fact that I could play music on my phone while phone was asleep or when using other apps. YouTube music sucks . I have to keep my phone awake while using. Also I can't easily play my personal music downloaded to my phone. Ill pay for Google music if I have to. How can I get it back? F your commercials, F your format, change something that was flawless. I will never listen to any music on YouTube music.

title: Math Exercises for the brain, Math Riddles, Puzzle
description:
Increase your brain power and compete against players from around the world!
Experience the heated battle that will keep you on your toes!

Free Math Games for everyone from kids to adults. Brain games is based on principles of cognitive psychology to help you practice different mental skills: memory, attention, speed, reaction, concentration, logic, mathematics, time tables and more math quiz. 

Fight with other people in math game in multiplayer Arena in real time! 

"Quick Brain" - it is a Puzzle game with many levels and multiplayer:
- Multiplication table
- Training game with flexible settings for math (Multiply, Plus, Minus, Divide), time for questions, complexity and type of game like Test, True / false or Input of answer with keyboard.
-  2048 - puzzle with many sizes, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8 and speed level
- True / False mathematics game
- Mathematics Balance
- Schulte table
- Multiplayer Arena with leaderboards. You can fight with your friends in real time!

For all ages: games for kids, for parents and for everybody!

The main advantages:
- quick developing of memory and attention for children and adults
- efficient training of the brain
- simple and understandable process of playing
- game is available without Internet connection
- app doesn’t spend much time
- number sense

The application will be useful for all ages:
- students and kids - to master the basics of mathematics and arithmetic, learn multiplication table, prepare for math tests and exams
- adults who want to keep their mind and brain in good shape

Develop your intellectual facilities by solving various mathematical tasks as quickly as possible: addition, subtraction, multiplication and division! Limited amount of time for answering only stimulates your brain to work faster, better and more efficiently.

Mountain your Math skills by playing «Quick Brain» daily! Compare your records with friends, thereby motivating yourself to be the best among them.

Brain Teasers do not require special knowledge so everyone can improve their brain function through repetition and adaptation. 

In Quick Brain your main target is to reach the highest number possible within the time limit, all while dealing with the high difficulty and all the other challenges that appear as you play.

What is «Quick Brain» trainer? 
- Your personal trainer in developing your skills;
- Mathematics game (Multiply, Plus, Minus, Divide games);
- Educational Puzzle;
- 2048 puzzle game
- Train concentration;
- IQ trainer;
- Smart & Quick Thinking ;
- Faster Reaction Speed;
- Simple and easy to use interface;
- Designed for smartphones and tablets
- Leaderboards of players.

Boost up your IQ with the mobile app «Quick Brain»!

Quick Brain math games is a brain-training, where logic & thinking & math meet fun, enjoyment, amusement and lighthearted pleasure. In our App We will See How To play together. 

- We added the classic 2048 puzzle - addictive and a very simple number puzzle game. You join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! 

HOW TO PLAY in 2048 puzzle: 
Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! 8 .. 16 ... 1024 .. 2048. To access Leaderboard, you will have to sign in using google plus account.

We in Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialQuickBrain/

Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater. © Albert Einstein.
Welcome to Quick Brain, the puzzle game where you get the power of math in your hands.

Download that app for FREE now!

With this update, we have fixed some bugs and improved the app performance. We are ready to make your game experience even greater!

comments: The best 👍💯🥰🥰😍😍😍😘😘lot of support from me. Actually I thought of dwonloading other game but your game has make me intelligent 😋 and it's interesting while I'm doing nothing but your game has a feeling that makes me happy because I answer and the game asked haha Btw the best is the multiplication stage ahh it's sad that now people doesn't have time to play like your game but other shooting games like PUBG but still this is the best game ever. And BTW Name's SIZZLE 13 years old 😁 ❤❤❤❤❤

If I said thanks then this is not enough and it will never be enough. By all means, this app is remarkable and so useful. Since my childhood I used to have problems with Math and till today actually I still but with this app I am developing myself a day by day and it really works. I have a suggestion for you to make this app perfect. Try to add more games that is suitable for all ages. Like what? Algebra, geometry and Trigonometry Basics and add a particular part for High school students.

Its, well, boring. A lot of games have no total timer, you can go on indefinitely if you don't make a mistake. Which would be fine, if the there were difficulty levels that persisted across game instances. As far as I can tell, I start at level 0 every time. And I simply don't feel like spending 10 minutes on 2-1 type calculations every time in hopes it gets more challenging later on. I guess if could be meant for children...

The game is very nice, helpful to solve simple mathematical problems (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division).But there is not percentage operator which is very important in daily life. And the 2048 game is so boring!!!

The games are very challenging. They're really good for our brain. I'm enjoying the games specially that they're offline. Thank you very much for developing these games. They are very helpful to us who are getting older.

title: Canon Print Service
description:
Canon Print Service is software that can print simply from the menus of applications that support Android's printing subsystem. It can print from smart phones and tablets using Canon printers connected to wireless networks.

Main features:
- Switching between color and black-and-white printing
- 2-sided printing
- 2 on 1 printing
- Borderless printing
- Stapling pages
- Setting paper types
- Secure printing
- Department ID management
- PDF direct printing
- Printer discovery by specifying IP address
- Recall from the share menu

* Items that can be set vary depending on the printer you are using.

If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 6 or earlier installed:
You need to activate the Canon Print Service for printing using it. The Canon Print Service is not activated immediately after installation. Activate it using one of the following methods.
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.
- Tap [Settings] > [Printing] > [Canon Print Service], and activate the service in the displayed settings screen.

*  If you are using a mobile terminal with Android 7 or later installed, the service is automatically activated after installation.

Compatible printers:

- Canon Inkjet Printers
PIXMA TS series, TR series, MG series, MX series, G series, E series, PRO series, MP series, iP series, iX series 
MAXIFY MB series, iB series, Business Inkjet series
imagePROGRAF PRO series, TX series, TM series, TA series
*Except for some models

- imageRUNNER ADVANCE series
- Color imageRUNNER series
- imageRUNNER series
- Color imageCLASS series
- imageCLASS series
- i-SENSYS series
- imagePRESS series
- LBP series
- Satera series
- Laser Shot series

- Compact Photo Printers
SELPHY CP900 series, CP1200, CP1300

Compatible OSs/Terminals:
- Terminals with Android 4.4.2 (KitKat) or later installed.

recentChanges:
Instructions on using the app can now be viewed by tapping the app icon.
Android 11 supported
Fixed minor bugs
comments: Worst printer app. Very unreliable. Everytime I want to print something it says my printer is not available. 90% of the time it doesn't work. Makes my printer useless. Very frustrating. Not the first time Canon apps have disappointed me. Had the same problem with their camera app. I'll be thinking twice before buying another Canon product. Even if it's a good deal.

Not "quick and easy" or functional... Installed the app. Upon opening the app, a static instructional page is displayed telling me to print from outside the app. Moving on to print a document, I select the canon option that now appears from the list of printers and get a nearly blank screen asking for the printer's IP address (unable to be detected itself from it's WiFi function) Searching Canon's troubleshooting page, I end up printing out a configuration page from the printer's menu, and I type in the IP address from a sheet of paper. The confirmation button stays greyed out. My only option is to cancel and delete the app. Because apparently it's just a waste of time.

I'm disappointed that double-sided printing is not supported. The option is present but greyed out. I raised the issue with Canon support but their unhelpful response was "if the option is greyed out then it is not supported" even though the printer does do double-sided printing when used with other products, just not the Canon Print Service!

The latest update removed functionality of the print service for me and my MG6220. The app/service (which now needlessly forces an icon into the Apps list) no longer automatically finds my printer, and when I try to manually find it by IP address, the app opens a numeric-only keyboard (no way to input decimal points for the address!).

I will Never buy another Canon anything again!!!!! When I first got the pixma it worked pretty good. But ever since August it has a mind of its own! It will print one page then grab 50 pieces of paper at once from the paper tray! The next time it won't print at all. I got the Ivy cliq ( for free) and it works on its own but to try and get it to print pictures from your phone? Forget it. I give up! Done with Canon!!

title: Woodoku
description:
Woodoku: wood block puzzle games meet a sudoku grid. It’s a calm but challenging puzzle that you’ll be addicted to in no time!

Place blocks in the 9x9 board and fill rows, columns or squares to clear them from the game. Play for as long as you can without running out of space to beat your high score!

How to Play:

□ Drag shapes onto the board to place them in the grid.
□ Fill a row, column, or square to clear blocks from the board.
□ Clear multiple rows, regions, or squares to earn Combo points!
□ Clear blocks on every turn to earn Streak points!
□ Earn as many points as you can to beat your high score!
□ Have yourself a woody good time!

It’s a quiet, zen game that’s easy to learn, but challenging to master! Take your time and take it easy.

Featuring:

□ Beautiful graphics and satisfying sound effects
□ A tactile game experience with realistic wood tile design
□ Relaxing gameplay with no pressure or time limit
□ A light, small game that won’t take space on your device
□ Playable offline so you can enjoy this classic anywhere

recentChanges:
We’ve got the latest Woodoku update for you, featuring:

Japanese Localisation:
Japanese players can now choose their language from the settings menu. Welcome to ウッドークー!

Daily Challenge Improvements:
We’ve added a few tweaks to the Daily Challenge, including a tutorial for new players, and a calendar view for dedicated players who want to track their streaks!

We hope you enjoy this update. If you have any feedback, please let us know at woodoku-support@tripledotstudios.com
comments: Fixed game. Very disappointing! The developer says that the distribution of pieces is random. Bull! After you get to a certain score, you'll never get a diagonal pattern in the initial distribution. Later, if you need pieces going vertically, you're given horizontal ones, if you need one going to the left, you only get pieces to the right. If I had this kind of luck in Vegas, if never go back, but even there they throw you a bone every once in a while! It's not just me, either. My wife and frien

This game is awesome. Super addictive, however, it would be nice if the game didn't deal me the exact opposite of a set if blocks i need. Feels like you're playing against "the house". It's bad enough that i play frequently, and i see the pattern. "Here's the perfect block for you" but you can't use it cuz its rotated or flipped the exact opposite way it's needed. Fix this and i could mindlessly play but it's starting to get boring. 5 star awesome game to keep your mind busy otherwise

Min 8 sec on only 1 or 2 adds before X shows. Then 30 or more on the rest. You need to correct this Fun game. But when the ads last longer than the game itself (after every game) and pop up ads while playing is incredibly STUPID! Takes the enjoyment out of the game. Edit, I am even getting push notifications now. Started right after I made this review!

This is a fun game but you should make it where we can rotate the pieces. Otherwise it's almost impossible to get very far. I'm uninstalling for now and will check back in the future to see if you change that feature. Till then there are other tetris type games that let you rotate.

I think this game would get a lot better if it had the option to store a piece rather than forced to play it. Just one piece like Tetris. Else wise it sets you up to lose. It addicting to try and beat your own score but it'll be frustrating at times.

title: NARUTO X BORUTO NINJA VOLTAGE
description:
Uniting favorite characters from popular anime BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS and NARUTO SHIPPUDEN, NARUTO X BORUTO: Ninja Voltage is a fortress strategy action game based off the popular manga ninja world of Naruto. Grow your village resources, create a ninja fortress and defend it from enemy attacks! Or go on the offensive and invade enemy ninja fortresses by defeating shinobi and traps with your most powerful ninja warriors and ninjutsu! Experience the epic fusion of fortress strategy and shinobi action today!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE NINJA CLAN
• Collect your favorite shinobi from both the NARUTO SHIPPUDEN and BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS! popular anime
• Including Naruto Uzumaki, Sasuke Uchiha, Boruto Uzumaki, Sarada Uchiha, and many more
• Enhance and evolve your ninjas to become the strongest clan

STRATEGIC NINJA FORTRESS BATTLES
• Design the ultimate shinobi fortress to protect village resources
• Defend your fortress from other players with traps, trained shinobi, and more
• Compete for Battle Rankings by attacking and protecting fortresses.

FAST PACED SHINOBI ACTION
• Perform ninja combos with simple controls in a beautiful 3D anime world
• Finish your foes with a variety of powerful Ninjutsu attacks such as Naruto Uzumaki's Rasengan
• Earn rewards by battling through various ninja missions

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MISSIONS
• Join a shinobi guild and go on missions
• Team up to 4 players to defeat the unsealed Giant Bosses in Suprise Attack Missions
• Or team up to invade and takedown other player's fortresses

Get ready to collect and battle with all your favorite NARUTO SHIPPUDEN and BORUTO: NARUTO NEXT GENERATIONS! characters and defend your ninja fortress in the popular anime game, NARUTO X BORUTO: Ninja Voltage today!

comments: I thought I was gonna give it another chance but it's way to pay to win. If you guys could lean more towards the free-to-play players and set it a pay-to-win players then this game will be way bigger. You guys add a new character like every month how are free to play players supposed to get those characters? Every time a new character comes out I have 100 Shino bites but it's like 500 to summon that doesn't make sense. Y'all won't see this cuz I drowning in money. Free-to-play games are best!!!

I love this game. It gives you all characters at the beginning and gives you easy chances of earning their cards and developing your village expeditiously and the graphics are amazing. Anything with Naruto I live for and I'm glad I have happen to be introduced to this game. But my problem is that the game consistently logs me out making me have to use the game's currency (Shinobite) just to restore my energy. Other than that I enjoy it and look forward to more ideas unfolding in the game!

Please fix the S.A.M. Event. This is the 2nd time I'm unable to play properly as the game crashes when the mission starts. I already contacted the support team for this before and tried their advise on clearing the cache from the game itself, but the issue persists. And from the looks of it, I'm not the only one having the issue. I actually enjoy this game but the crashing issue with S.A.M. is irritating. Please fix it!

Despite the constant kick out from attack missions, the game is overall good, just gotta work on the app to where it wont kick players out of the attack missions. I am aware that there are others battling the same issue, so im adressing me as well as the others that battle the same issue. The sam missions will not work for me and the team missions for the Naruto ( kumara link mode) aren't working either, please fix these issues for other players and me.

So unfortunate, such great potential, such poor delivery! Now more P2W than ever! Well laid out and easy to navigate with plenty to do and lots of useless characters. New characters are going to be p2w walled requiring upto 8000 Shinobites, which are priced sooo absolutely insanely high for what you get. Psuedo "daily" missions never seem to reset, so they should just call them "monthly" missions. Ai pathfinding is terrible. A fun game that could be great if they care to actually fix problems...

title: Texas Hold'em & Omaha Poker: Pokerist
description:
Play Texas hold’em poker free with millions of players from all over the world!
Immerse yourself in the world of Texas hold'em excitement, challenges and victories to prove that you're a true winner.
Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever!

Game features:
• FREE CHIPS – Play the game every day to get free chips!
• TOURNAMENTS – Master your poker skills! Participate in WEEKLY Sit'n'Go and Shootout tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard!
• GET REWARDS – Up the stakes, win hands, go all-in and unlock achievements.
• PARTY MODES – Mix up your Texas hold'em poker game with unique game modes and get amazing combinations!
• BOOST POKER MODE – The biggest "winner takes all" weekly tournament, where you spin the reel for a chance to win 5 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game!
• PLAY AGAINST THE CASINO – Try your luck at unique poker modes. Challenge the dealer in Split bet poker and Set poker!
• MULTI-TABLE TOURNAMENTS (MTT) – The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Play at several tables with lots of worthy competitors and reach the final table!
• QUESTS - Complete daily quests to get free chips!
• YOUR OWN PROFILE PAGE – Track your progress and status in the game! Get experience and level up. See how many poker tournaments you've won and achievements you've completed. Get unique properties and display them on your profile. View other players' profiles to see how you compare!

title: Tiles Hop: EDM Rush!
description:
HOT! HOT! HOT!

Monstercat is going online. Play your favorite songs with our newest character. Try to get the highest scores with the FANTASTIC game ever!

Heard About EDM Tiles? With Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! you can play various types of music, from beautiful Piano, Guitar songs to Rock and EDM masterpieces. 

How to play

1. Touch, Hold and Drag the ball to make it jump on the Tiles. 
2. Don't Miss the Tiles! 
3. You can now upload your own songs to play
4. Enjoy the awesome music and addictive challenges designed for each song.

The Ball will jump on the Beats Drop. Listen to the magic beat, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes to guide the ball from tiles to tiles. Do not Tap! This is not a Tap Tap game.
Don't forget to make insane combos and beat your friend's scores!

Hit Songs + Ball Game +  Tiles = Awesomeness
Game features
- Auto-generated content: upload your favorite songs to bounce to the music
- One-touch control, easy to play
- Breathtaking 3D visual and effects
- 30+ absolutely beautiful and fun songs to relax
- 20+ Different backgrounds to truly bring you a new experience every plays!
- Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls
- Beat your own top score and dare your best friends for a challenge
- Share your record with your friends, and compare it with worldwide players on the ranking list!
- Connect with Facebook account and sync the saved progress across multiple devices

Bounce off the magic music tiles, listen to the beat, and make as many hops as you can in this mind-blowing music game now for Free!

This game will create the whole new experience for music game fan.

Tiles Hop: EDM Rush! is totally Free! Play this EDM music Running Game now!
